```{r}
library(dplyr)

merge <- read.csv("Merge.csv")
head(merge)
```

```{r}
plot(rate ~ c_avg, data = merge, xlim = c(0.1, 0.3))
```
```{r}
plot(rate~c_elas, data = merge)
```

we can get that the important variables are fed_avg st_avg st_elas

```{r}
plot(log(rate)~log(c_marg), data = merge)
```
```{r}

```



```{r}
lm1 <- lm(rate ~c_avg, data = merge)
summary(lm1)
```

```{r}
library(car)
inverseResponsePlot(lm1)
```

```{r}
lm2<- lm((rate ^ 0.5843728) ~ log(c_avg) , data = merge)
summary(lm2)
```


```{r}
plot(lm2)
```
